{"games":[{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1360987,"totalDownVotes":150947,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven üè°RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":396310,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.
 
Development Info- Wolfpaq has been and is in the process of moving in real life. Updates to the game will still continue, but may be delayed. We apologize for any inconvenience.

RP Set- A term used to identify a house or structure that has a central theme that can be more specifically roleplayed with. It will be marked different than a normal house.

We are a small two person Dev team working hard to make Brookhaven the best it can be.
Thanks for playing!"},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":286231,"totalDownVotes":25364,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[Update] King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":95064,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 1525
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Smoke, Flame, Ice, Sand, Dark, Light, Magma, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Control, and Dragon!
FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans."},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4399831,"totalDownVotes":818222,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":166216,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! üê∂üèòÔ∏èüòª

--- 25% more gold!"},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":304373,"totalDownVotes":157373,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":26554,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

For You to Stay ¬© 2019 Mira K."},{"creatorId":1103278,"creatorName":"StyLiS Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1828661,"totalDownVotes":143191,"universeId":113491250,"name":"Phantom Forces","placeId":292439477,"playerCount":8922,"imageToken":"T_292439477_68f7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Thank you for supporting us for over five years to help reach 1B+ visits!

Thank you for continuing support for PF for over 5 years!"},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1219957,"totalDownVotes":69196,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":16419,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator!
